scripts.start: npm run attestation && npm run build && node ./build/main.js
scripts.attestation: if [[ -z "$npm_config_service" || -z "$npm_config_project_env" ]]; then echo "Warning: npm_config_service and npm_config_project_env not set. Skipping attestation file copy."; else cp -f src/public/.well-known/privacy-sandbox-attestations.json."$npm_config_service"."$npm_config_project_env" src/public/.well-known/privacy-sandbox-attestations.json; fi
